channel.title: Revenue on FinanClub

item.title: TSM
item.description: score:-10 Chances: The monthly revenue report from Taiwan Semiconductor Manufacturing could be a bullish sign for semiconductor investors. The company’s shares are higher on Hump Day, indicating encouraging news items. Risks: China has been trying to match Taiwan in chip technology, but hasn’t succeeded yet despite investing huge sums.
